content: The app is fine. Billing is weird. Form tried to bill me using Google Pay, which is fine. BUT the name was a person not "FORM," so I suspected fraud and stopped the transaction thru my credit card. Once I verified that it was FORM, i have been in anightmare secnario with goole pay and Form. There is no way to renew the subscription once it expires. No tabs or buttons or icons in Google pay or the form app to re-subscribe so I can get workouts. Looking forward to hearing a solution so I don't have to switch to another product.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Russ. We have since helped you to resolve this issue and thank you for bringing it to our attention. We hope you will enjoy your year of free Workouts in your goggles!

content: This is a great product and app. As someone who still wants to swim daily but doesn't have time for a team, this is the next best thing to having a coach standing next to you in the pool (just without all the yelling). I'm amazed with the goggles motion awareness and accuracy (my watches will often +/- a leangth randomly). My only suggestion would be to have personalized workout programs available much like other swimming apps. Looking forward to the next (slimmer) version of the goggles!
replyContent: Thanks for the awesome review, Victor! We're so happy to hear that you love the goggles' accuracy and the motivation they provide! And thanks for the great suggestion, personalized workout programs isn't something youâ€™re able to do at this time, but we have passed your feedback on to our Product team!

content: Really great app and goggles. I wish it could time out the display until I get close to a turn so I don't have to always see the numbers when zen and speeding through the water! UPDATED: Thank you for the reply. Leaving the question because it shows how easy this was to do once I found this customization area and how awesome this makes the device! Thank you for making a great product!!!
replyContent:
Thanks for your review, Jerome. Actually, you can switch off the swim dashboard so that you only see the display when turning and resting! In the app, where you configure the dashboards, you can toggle it off there. Hope this helps! - FORM Support
EDIT: (leaving our answer in case someone has the same question). So glad it helped! Thank you!

content: In general, it works well. Keeps track of workout and is easy to read. My one gripe is the way the workout builder is set up. You can't do repeat intervals, only rest intervals. You can't set rest times below 10 seconds, so no 25s w/ 5s rest. They've limited the interval distances available. You can't do 225s or 350s if you wanted. Most annoyingly, you can't do a 1650 even though that is the short course yard competition equivalent of the 1500m.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! We're sorry that it isn't currently possible to create workouts with rests below 10 sec in the Custom Workout Builder. The goggles need a minimum rest in order to track the workout accurately. Rest assured, we've passed your request for rests less than 10 seconds and add more distances on to our product team. Happy swimming!

content: I originally purchased a pair 12/2019. Despite some early issues the goggles performed flawlessly afterwards. They are a major motivator to swim regularly and stimulate me to better my times. While competitive swimmers are probably all familiar with Form's goggles, I highly recommend them for casual swimmers like me who, at 60, is staying healthy by taking swimming up again after 45 years. Fantastic service, great product.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Victor! We love to have that your FORM goggles are a major motivator to swim regularly and better your times! We're happy to hear that you highly recommend FORM for casual swimmers! Happy swimming!

content: Nice clean ans simple app interface. So far I had 4 sessions and I love it. It is very helpful to see running clock vs specific metrics in goggles. Would be nice to have ability to change metrics in the pool. So far I learned how to set metrics on the phone and synch before a pool session.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Sergei! So glad you're finding the goggles and the app useful! I have passed on your feedback about changing the metrics in the pool to the product team. - FORM Support

content: The goggles have given me more focus and direction to work on specific elements of training. Real-time feedback on times and heart rates (with polar OH1+ sensor on goggle strap) is great. The ability to easily build your own sessions in the app and transfer them to the goggles is fantastic, and the process is surprisingly straightforward. Definitely a fan!
replyContent: Thanks for your review!

content: Update: The so continues to improve. The import from TP is excellent. Upgrading to 5* Suggestion: Link up with Magic 5 and get them to produce compatible eye cups/seals. Would be awesome. So far so good. Used the goggles and app for a week. It's been very good. Will come back and give an update after I have used it longer. Could be improved if workouts were CSS based, but I guess I'll get over that small issue.
replyContent: Thanks for your review and your suggestions!

content: FORM smart goggles are the coolest thing I've bought for a long time! I rediscovered my interest in swimming with them. The app is also amazing although I don't think it has much value without the goggles.
replyContent: Thanks for your review!

content: The app just works, syncing the swim from my goggles and uploading to Strava seamlessly. I couldn't ask for more. Update: They removed the "premium membership expired" messages from the goggle firmware in their latest update, so I'm reinstating a 5-star review for listening to user feedback.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, A.J.! We love to hear that the FORM app just works and the syncing works seamlessly. Happy swimming!

content: The most recent update doesn't allow me to view lap times within intervals. I can only view the total time for the interval or lap time for every single lap, not traced to intervals.
replyContent: Thank you for reporting this issue. This is a bug the engineering team is working to fix ASAP!

content: Best swim goggles ever. If you want to understand your swim technique and how to improve it, these goggles are unbeatable.
replyContent: Thanks for your review!!

content: Super product, I have been using this for 4 months, not going back to traditional goggles. Just empowering to see it all
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback!

content: Love these goggles and app! Have been using them for 2 years and it has made a huge difference in my training as well as motivation.
replyContent: Thanks for your review!

content: Still figuring it out the app. Love that I can see my time and laps real time visually my goggles instead of having to stop to see it on a wrist device.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! Please reach out if you need any help!

content: when I open videos on the coaching tab the app crashes:( Ive restarted my phone, cleared cache and uninstalled/reinstalled the app without success
replyContent: Thank you for your review - sorry to hear that! So that we can look into this, please can you email us at support@formswim.com? Thanks!

content: I've had to knock some points off unfortunately. In general, the app is good and the Strava integration is great, but I have to reboot my phone (Pixel 3, Android 11) every single time to sync, which is a pain. Also, it constantly misregisters my strokes as 'mixed' rather than crawl â€“ also a pain. There's still no way to see the current clock time in any of the dashboards (actual time, not minutes swam), which would be really useful for swimmers fitting in a session before work or in a lunch break.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback and review, Anthony. There is the time on the screen when you pause the swim but we have let the product team know you'd like to see it during the swim too. For the phone reboot issue and the stroke misidentification issue, please reach out to us and our support team will be happy to help!

content: Everything is working fine. The goggles are really good and the App is also very straightforward and easy to use. One feature that would be great to see is to have the option to sync your own structured workouts from other platforms like TrainingPeaks, and do them on the goggles! I'm sure that would be a feature many swimmers and Triathletes would love to see since many Athletes follow a personalised Plan. Thank you for the great Product. I'm Looking forward to seeing more features.
replyContent: Thanks for the great review, Stefan! We're happy to hear that you love the goggles and app! That's a great suggestion, while this isnâ€™t something youâ€™re able to do at this time, we have passed your comment to our Product team! Please contact our support team through our site as weâ€™d love to hear more about how this feature would be helpful to you.

content: I love the goggles and the app! Spectacular! But why does the app need an internet connection to refresh the results? It should be done locally via Bluetooth. (In the same context, I didn't appreciate receiving a marketing email saying "now that you've used the goggles a couple of times"... How do you know that? Who else has access to my data and where did I consent to that?) Could we also expect some further integrations in the future? (e.g. Google Fit?)
replyContent: We're glad to hear you love the goggles and the app! Internet is required since your swim data gets synced to our cloud to be processed before being shown in app. We take privacy very seriously and do not share your data. The email you received is from us to gather feedback. We will pass on your suggestion of connecting to Google Fit!

content: The FORM app and goggles itself are of superb quality and I'm a very happy triathlete because of it. They have been fundamental to my training Why two stars then? While, that's all because I feel FORM is changing the rules of the game while we are playing. They have introduced guided workouts (great!) but decided to put it behind a subscription. I disagree with this decision but even worse - the price is completely ridiculous. 19 EUR by month? Really? I seriously thought this was a mistake..
replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback.
Workouts offers an ongoing service with heavy investment in content creation and feature development. We feel it makes sense to provide this as a membership, similar to other connected fitness experiences like Peloton or Zwift, and for a fraction of the cost of a swim coach.

content: Simple for looking to swim and monitor efficiency. Haven't tried workouts from them yet.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Ron! We're happy to hear that FORM is easy to use and simple to monitor efficiency while swimming. Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions about swimming the guided workouts. Happy swimming!

content: Amazing goggles and app, definitely helped me improve my swim times by a lot. Also, since they are kinda pricey (well worth) they are expensive enough to be an extra incentive to swim, cause besides swimming these goggles wont be used anywhere else! Def try em out if you like to swim and want to improve your timing!
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Eric! - FORM Support

content: Generally good and clear but I frequently have to restart my android phone to synch, and now I'm not able to watch the video tutorials anymore which is a big problem (no idea why, it just says "we can't open this file type"). If everything worked as expected would be a 5 stars
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Valentina. We're very sorry to hear that you're having issues syncing your goggles with the app and viewing the video tutorials in the app. We have sent you a follow up email to assist you with these issues and we look forward to hearing from you.

content: Australian customer. When first opening the app and trying to create an account I can't get past the create bio page. Same error regardless of method of registration (Facebook, Gmail, email) "something went wrong". Goggles are useless without the app as can't update software. Expensive and disappointing. Don't bother if you don't live in the US.
replyContent: Thanks for your review. We're very sorry to hear about your experience. The app works for all countries where it is downloadable so it sounds like there's a bug that we can help with. Please reach out to us at formswim.com/contact-us so that we can help you with this right away! We look forward to hearing from you.

content: Best bit of swim kit I have had for ages.
replyContent: Thanks for your comments - that's awesome!

content: Game changer!!! This is amazing! As a lifelong competitive swimmer I wish I had found this 20 years ago. It gives your pace per lap, you have a pace clock in your vision. It is easy to operate, easy to see and the actual goggle itself is watertight and comfortable. I absolutely love it!
replyContent: Thanks for your awesome review, Kelly! That's amazing!

content: Form are the best tech for swimming. This is the most complete app for swimming I believe.. love it. Very easy to use, very clean design and a lot of metrics.. almost every thing you.can immagine is there...
replyContent: Thank you for your awesome review, Pasquale! So glad to hear you love using the goggles and app!

content: I rated a 5. However, the "swim screen" should really have a stopwatch counter that resets each turn (even for 25m). Without the polar heart rate monitor, there is little I find useful to display on that "swim screen" that couldn't already be displayed on the "turn screen"
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Peter. You can choose to see the last length's time on the turn screen and, on the swim screen, you can choose to see either the workout time or the interval timer. You can also turn off the swim screen if you only wish to see the turn screen. Please reach out if you need help!

content: Not very good. The unit buttons were defective and so I couldn't save my first swim with it. Returned it and waiting for a refund. Quality control is essential for a device like this. Lacking here. Really disappointed.
replyContent: Thanks for providing more detail. We really apologize that you received a defective device. We take quality very seriously and are happy to replace any defective device. You've been in contact with us at FORM Support for the return of the goggles and requested a refund - please let us know if there's anything else we can do. Fiona, FORM Support

content: Loving these goggles. I use them for both open water and training with my club. If using for open water I suggest pairing with a garmin watch to get more tracking details but the pool information logged and tracked is amazing. It pushes me harder and keeps my stroke count and pace consistent when I need it.
replyContent: Thanks for the great review, Henry! We love to hear that the goggles help to push you harder and keep your pace consistent! We're so happy to hear that the goggles work great for both open water and training with your club! Happy swimming!

content: I love being able to concentrate on my swim stroke rather than keeping count of my laps. I have found it to be very accurate and like being able to sync it to my phone and review all my swims.
replyContent: Thanks for your awesome review!

content: Been using this app with the goggles for several months now and it's amazing! I have trouble keeping count of my laps, so having a device that helps keep track as well as give me my pace, makes all the difference.
replyContent: Thanks for the awesome review, Khary! We love to hear that the goggles and app help you keep track of your laps and pace while you swim! Happy swimming!

content: Works great with the swim goggles! The redesign is excellent. Make sure you enable gps/location services before pairing though, because the app doesn't prompt you.
replyContent:
Thanks for the great review, G.J.! We're happy to hear that the updated version of the app with our new Custom Workout Builder is excellent! We truly value our customersâ€™ comments and passed your feedback on to our product team.
Weâ€™re always looking to improve, so thank you for taking the time to share this with us! Happy swimming!

content: $200 lap counter. After 5 sessions in a 25m pool, I realize these googles are almost worthless. First and foremost: they do NOT ACCURATELY COUNT FREESTYLE STROKES. I mean way way off. I typically hit 16-17 strokes per length, these things will count towards of 40. So much for your SWOLF score. Also, you cannot add more than 150m of drills if you have a 25m pool selected. After getting in touch with support, they admit both these issues are known and 'keep an eye out for an update'. Return
replyContent: Hi Steve. Thanks for your feedback and I'm sorry to hear you wish to return the goggles. The fix for the freestyle stroke issue (which affects a small number of users) and adjusting the drills distance will be out in a few weeks. We're working hard to constantly improve the experience for our swimmers! - FORM Support

content: Does this not yet have an auto shutdown feature while in swimming mode. However, customer service was very friendly and responsive and promised to fix this. Will change review to 5 stars once fixed.
replyContent: Hi Quang - thanks for your review. We appreciate you reaching out to us, and are always open to feedback! Happy swimming - FORM Support

content: Easy to get set up and way more data available than I realized there would be. Love swimming with these googles and the app makes it super easy to sync and read results.
replyContent: Thanks for your awesome review! So happy to hear you love the goggles and app!

content: Great app & product, only thing i'd add is a real time lap timer. Right now theres only an overall timer, and timer for the lap you just completed, but seeing it in real time would be very beneficial.
replyContent: Thanks for your awesome review and feedback!

content: I was not sure what to expect but Form is fantastic! The data is very clear and easy to interpret. When I realised that it synchronized with Strava and Garmin Connect I was 100% sold
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, Jacqui! So glad to hear you love the goggles and the app! - FORM Support

content: Out of the box, 2 hours later and still can't get past the Bio page. However, the company DID respond to my cry for help and worked on their end to fix the problem. I did not have to troubleshoot with them or get on a call. Thanks for helping me so quickly.
replyContent: Thanks for your review. We're sorry you had this issue but we're glad we were able to fix it! Thanks so much for your patience and understanding. Happy swimming!

content: Goggles themselves rock. App sucks. Need a way to edit swim length for laps the goggles don't pick up. Also, need a way to choose content to view in app: I care nothing about"following" others, yet that's the default.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, Brad. Sorry to hear you feel that way! If you could contact FORM Support, we can help you identify the reasons the goggles may not be picking up the number of lengths correctly. I will pass on your feedback about personalizing the content you see in the app to the product team. - FORM Support

content: Great app. Super happy. How to make it better : Need to drill down within an interval to view each lap. Need to correct the app if style mislabeled. Need to tell the app if I'm using hand or foot palms
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, Gary. You should be able to see every length of an interval by tapping on that interval in the highlights tab of your swim. Please reach out to FORM Support if you need helping finding that! If you are using special equipment or doing special exercises, we recommend using drills mode. Hope this helps! - FORM Support

content: Ive had this for a week so far. Ive had zero issues. Im really enjoying my goggles and all the data they collect. The app is easy to navigate and there is a lot of info to look through.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! So glad to hear you're enjoying your goggles and that the app is easy to use!

content: Easy to learn and use. Useful information. Not overly complicated.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Fu-Min! We love to hear that the FORM Swim App provides useful information and is easy to use and learn! Happy swimming!

content: overall very user- friendly. however witnessed one glitch in my few days of using.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! We're happy to hear that the FORM app is very user friendly! We're very sorry to hear that you encountered a glitch in the app. If you can provide our support team with more details about the glitch by email at support@formswim.com, we will be happy to assist you further.

content: Far more accurate than I would have thought Great for knowing what I need to hold to make interval with rest
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Jack! We love to hear that the FORM app and goggles are far more accurate than you would have thought! We're happy to hear that the real-time metrics are great for tracking your swim! Happy swimming!

content: It's a great app. Very intuitive and stable. I only wish I can zoom in into the timeline and see particular time periods more granular
replyContent: Thank you for your review, and for your feedback which has been shared with the product team!

content: Not much is working in this new update. Edit: All seems to work as long as I agree to let the App access my location. Please fix, I don't want to provide my location. Thanks
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Michel. We're very sorry to hear that you're having issues with the recent update to the FORM Swim App. We want you to love the FORM membership and app so we have sent you a follow-up email for more information and to assist you further. We look forward to hearing from you.

content: I cannot turn the goggles on to pair it. There is no screen. Tried to hard reset did not work battery is full. Tried to upgrade the goggles .after 5 hours still not done. Bluetooth and internet on. HELP ME PLEASE !!!!!!!!
replyContent: Sorry to hear that! Please reach out to us at formswim.com/contact-us via email or live chat from that page and we'll be happy to help you!

content: I dont know what I was doing this long without my FORM goggles. They're great. Splits,stoke count type total.meters swam. Wow all swimmers from beginnrs to world class should have a pair. Thanks for the great product. Norther Alberta Canada.
replyContent: Thanks for the awesome feedback, Marcus! - FORM Support

content: Constantly over calculates swim distance. Did 1200 meters and form said I did 1,975 meters. Wish there is a way to configure pool length by pushing a button.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, David. You can choose the pool size at the beginning of your swim so that the goggles calculate your distance correctly. If you need help with this, please reach out at support@formswim.com and we will be happy to help you!

content: Work like a charm and sync with the goggle seamlessly. Swim results presented in a well organized form. Love it!
replyContent: Thanks for your kind feedback, Lim! So glad to hear you love the goggles and the app! - FORM Support

content: It's great to just concentrate on technique and listen to my music and not count laps. Hopefully can save some money and get heart rate monitor.
replyContent: Thanks for your awesome review!

content: I was so excited to finally get my pair! Having the ability to check my pace distance during my swim is absolutely amazing! (Especially during an open water swim) I am very much looking forward to see what else FORM has planned ðŸ¤—
replyContent: Thanks so much for your feedback! So glad you love the goggles!

content: Amazing! One of the best ways to know how much your doing and the calorie you have lost and with the split times after every length.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, Reuben! So glad to hear you're loving see the data! - FORM Support

content: Initially I had trouble getting the app to sync with Strava but the developer was quite responsive and fixed it relatively quickly.
replyContent: Thanks for the great review, Jeffrey! We're happy to help and glad that we were able to resolve the issue with your app not syncing with your Strava account. Happy swimming!

content: Unable to update the newly bought Goggles, kept trying over and over with different troubleshooting and nothing worked. Probably got a defective set
replyContent: Hi Joash, sorry to hear that you're not able to update your goggles - we can definitely help you with that! Please contact us at formswim.com/contact-us with details of what you're experiencing and we'll be able to solve this issue! Looking forward to hearing from you - FORM Support

content: Great app to go along with my Form goggles. Bluetooth setup was so easy and everything is working flawlessly. Kudos to the team!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, David! So glad to hear it all works smoothly! - FORM Support

content: Great app, easy to use with great custom options. I am really enjoying the goggles I think they are going to be a great tool in improving my performance.
replyContent: So glad to hear the goggles and app will be a great help to improve your swim performance!

content: Incredible. It helped me design a swimfit program for myself that reversed my pre-diabetic state, and lost 20kg (sorry only metric ðŸ¤£) as a result. My swims are now relaxing and pure joy knowing exactly how many calories im burning. Ps, and Form, THANKS FOR THE SWIM CAPS ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ðŸ’—
replyContent: Thanks so much for your amazing review, Zahur! We love to hear how the googles have helped you design a swimfit program to reach your goals and focus more on the joy of swimming!

content: The greatest advantage is seeing the swimming stats and heart rates during swimmining. Pace and heart-rate measurements are more accurate than most other devices.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Paul! Glad to hear you're loving the app and goggles!

content: I have over 260 swim miles on my goggles. They remind me when I "lose focus" during a longer swim and start slowing down. In an open water swim along a beach, I can swim a 'half mile' turn around and swim a 'half mile' back, walk out of the ocean and my towel is right there. I don't swim without my FORM goggles.
replyContent: Thank you for the awesome rating, Roger! We're so glad you are enjoying the goggles and that they are pushing you to swim more.

content: Excellent app that accurately keeps track of my distance, strokes, and intensity.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Michael! We love to hear that the FORM app and goggles accurately keep track of your distance, strokes and intensity! Happy swimming!

content: A very neat piece of technology for swimming. Looking forward to the open water update.
replyContent: Thank you, Steve! We're looking forward to it, too!

content: The goggles are amazing. The app is pretty see less in terms of integration with the goggles. No complaints here.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! So glad you're loving the goggles and app! - FORM Support

content: Form goggles really move you to the next level. Clear precise instructions. They have thought of everything.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review! We love to hear that the FORM goggles provide clear precise instructions and move you to the next level! Happy swimming!

content: Android requires a Bluetooth passkey to pair, the app does not over ride this therefore the goggles cannot be paired.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Greg. We see you also emailed about this issue and we are working with you to resolve this.

content: Great app. I like the format of a workout analysis screen. Even before got the goggles preferred analysis of Garmin swim data in this app compared to Garmin app.
replyContent: Thanks so much for your feedback! Glad to hear you're loving the app!

content: This app has used up 1.44GB yes GB in 2 days? I streamed a whole soccer game and it didn't even come close to this apps usage. Why it uses this my data is beyond me!
replyContent: Hi Alex, we're sorry to hear about this. We are investigating and have replied to your email.

content: Formswim goggles are the best way of monitoring my swim training. The live heart rate helps me pace. Custom workouts boost my motivation.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Martin! We love to hear that FORM goggles are the best way of monitoring your swim training and that the live heart rate helps you with your pace! We're happy to hear that the custom workouts also boost your motivation! Happy swimming!

content: Obviously this app is only useful if you have the goggles, which are great! If you don't have the goggles then it would be of zero value
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Rob!

content: What an amazing piece of equipment designed to improve your swimming. Once you use it you'll never want to train with out it
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Scott! We love to hear that the FORM goggles are an amazing piece of equipment designed to improve your swimming and we definitely agree that once you use it you'll never want to train without it! Happy swimming!

content: Amazing stats, goals and shows areas to improve. 100 % recommended!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! Glad to hear you love seeing the stats!

content: A great companion app
replyContent: Thanks for your review!

content: It would be cool to be able to compare your performance on the same workout over time. Or just analyze your progress over time.
replyContent: Thanks so much for your great review and suggestions to be able to compare your performance on the same workout or overall over time, Michael! We truly value our customersâ€™ comments and have passed your feedback on to our product team for consideration. Weâ€™re always looking to improve, so thank you for taking the time to share this with us!

content: Unable to cancel subscription
replyContent: Thanks for your review. We're very sorry for any confusion regarding cancelling your subscription. You can use your FORM app account log in information to access the portal: https://www.formswim.com/pages/login to cancel your subscription. Please reach out to us if you run into any issues and we'll be happy to assist you further.

content: This is a great app paired with the goggles. I definitely pushed myself harder w/ the pair.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Jessica! We're happy to hear that the FORM app and goggles helped you push yourself harder in your swimming! Happy swimming!

content: After only a few days of using the goggles and the app, I am loving the amount of data that I'm getting. Now I just need to speed up.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Ian! We're happy to hear that you love the amount of data provided by the FORM goggles and app! Happy swimming!

content: Great analysis of my swims and the goggles are just brilliant. I feel like a swimming borg lol.
replyContent: Thanks for the great review, Ray! We love to hear that the goggles and analysis of your swims on the app are brilliant! Happy swimming!

content: Great insight to the details, however the real win is the dynamic feedback whilst swimming, happy dayz!!
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Nick! We love to hear that you love the dynamic feedback and metrics provided by your FORM goggles whilst swimming! Happy swimming!

content: Excellent information. Very easy to use. Logical setup.
replyContent: Thanks for your review!

content: I cant create a profile there, i dont understand validation message. Weak efforts from UX and development team
replyContent: Sorry to hear this! We can definitely help you resolve this issue. Please contact us at formswim.com/contact-us so that we can look into it for you.

content: Works perfectly and has all the apropiate data with pretty cool visualizations.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Lucian! - FORM Support

content: A great training tool. Finally feedback during the swim.
replyContent: Thank you, Ron, for your review! - FORM Support

content: I am impressed how well it keeps the laps count in the pool. I'm still new to it, I'll update this review later on.
replyContent: Thanks for your amazing review, Robert! We love to hear that the FORM goggles are doing a great job of tracking your swim metrics in the pool! Please feel free to reach out to us if you need any assistance using the goggles or app. Happy swimming!

content: The Form App is exceptional! Easy to use and incredible partner for these great goggles
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Patrick! We love to hear that the FORM Swim App is exceptional, easy to use and an incredible partner for the great FORM goggles! Happy swimming!

content: Tried to download the app multiple times, but it won't connect, just says pending.
replyContent: Thank you for your review, Hydie. Weâ€™re very sorry to hear that you are having issues with the FORM Swim App. Rest assured, our support team has reached out by email to resolve this issue with you. Please reply to our email if you need further assistance with this.

content: I enjoy swimming more because I can focus on listening to books to pass the time instead of trying to remember my lap number
replyContent: That's great feedback, thanks Pete! Happy swimming! - FORM Support

content: Cannot download. Took 2+ hours and 6 attempts but now its downloaded thank you. Does the $35 ex delivery charge cover the inport duty into Colombia also, please?

content: Accurate on lengths and time. Interesting to see the breakdowns as well

replyContent: Thanks for your review! Unfortunately, the connection with Garmin works in the opposite direction to the other platforms we connect with, meaning that you can import your Garmin swims to the FORM app but not export your FORM swims out to Garmin. Unfortunately this is a limitation from Garmin's side. Please reach out to us if you have any questions.
